1.caption_en:
Slide illustrating Apple's horizontal-integration strategy with a radial ecosystem diagram that places the user at the center and maps product and service categories (Health, Work, Entertainment, Mobility, Finance, Home, Education, Socializing) around them. Examples such as Apple Watch, MacBook, iPhone, Apple TV, Apple Pay and CarPlay are shown as touchpoints across those categories.

2.caption_en:
A presentation slide showing Apple's horizontal integration strategy with a user-centered radial diagram that maps ecosystem categories (Health, Work, Entertainment, Mobility, Finance, Home, Education, Socializing) to example products and services like Apple Watch, MacBook, Apple TV and Apple Pay. The slide includes a black Apple logo, headings and short lists of services around the circular chart.

4.caption_en: A circular radial diagram showing a central user icon surrounded by concentric rings and a teal-and-lime segmented wheel of triangular wedges radiating outward. The design resembles a target or hub-and-spoke infographic emphasizing different sectors.
4.caption_ru: A circular radial diagram showing a central user icon surrounded by concentric rings and a teal-and-lime segmented wheel of triangular wedges radiating outward. The design resembles a target or hub-and-spoke infographic emphasizing different sectors.
